name: Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack
description:
Fishing Planet Anniversary Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCONS
* 7-DAY PREMIUM
* 40 Storage Slots
* 2 Tackle Setups Slots

RODS
* Rivertex™ Salmonster™ 220
* Rivertex™ Salmonster™ 270
REELS
* Rivertex™ RedFish™ 4500
* Rivertex™ RedFish™ 5500

* Lines:
Fluoro: .022'(0.55 mm), .024'(0.6 mm)
* JigHeads: 1 Oz.(30 g) 6/0, 7/8 Oz.(25 g) 4/0, 3/4 Oz.(21 g) 3/0, 1 1/2 Oz.(42 g) 4/0, 1 5/8 Oz.(48 g) 6/0, 2 Oz.(56 g) 4/0, 2 Oz.(56 g) 6/0
* Softbait: Nymphes 3'(7.5 cm)(x2), Nymphes 4'(10 cm)(x2)
* Single Spoons: 1Oz.(28 g) 2/0(x3), Single Spoon 1 1/2 Oz.(42 g) 4/0(x3)
* Bullet Spinners: 6/7 Oz.(24 g) 2/0(x4), 1 1/4 Oz.(36 g) 4/0(x4)
* Crankbaits: 3 ft(1 m) 3/0, 6 ft(2 m) 3/0, 8 ft(2.5 m) 6/0, 12 ft(3.5 m) 4/0, 16 ft(5 m) 3/0, 16 ft(5 m) 6/0

* FPA Cup Jacket
* FPA Cup Rod Case
* FishCastle L Fishnet

LICENSES:
* Advanced Alaska License
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced California License



Offline single player
Online multiplayer (2-64 players). Online features require an account and are subject to our terms of service (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service), our privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy), and the game publisher’s privacy policy.
Uses DUALSHOCK 4 vibration function
Online play required


Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).

One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
